mapper.insert: insert into product_tbl (cate_code, pro_name, pro_rentalprice, pro_price, pro_discount, pro_content, pro_upfolder, pro_img, pro_amount, pro_buy) values(#{cate_code},#{pro_name},#{pro_rentalprice},#{pro_price}, #{pro_discount},#{pro_content},#{pro_upfolder},#{pro_img}, #{pro_amount},#{pro_buy})
mapper.select: select pro_num, cate_code, pro_name, pro_price, pro_discount, pro_content, pro_upfolder, pro_img, pro_amount, pro_buy, pro_date, pro_updatedate from product_tbl where pro_num > 0
